sections.purpose: To clean intricate glassware by removing stubborn residues using ultrasound.
sections.scope: Applicable to glassware maintenance in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Fill the cleaner with distilled water and a mild detergent.
Arrange the glassware in the basket to avoid contact between items.
Lower the basket into the bath and set the cleaning time.
Run the ultrasonic cleaner and check for residue removal.
Rinse the glassware thoroughly with fresh distilled water.
Drain the tank and dry it with a soft tissue.
Store cleaned glassware in a dust-free cabinet.
precautions: Check for cracks in glassware to prevent breakage during vibration.
Do not use for volumetric glassware at high temperatures.
Ensure the water level is always at the operating line.
Avoid using aggressive chemicals that could corrode the basin.
Use a lid to reduce noise and prevent aerosols.
